title: Thousands Sign Petition After Meteorologist Fired for Musk Salute ...
snippet: Jon previously worked at The Week, the River Journal, Den of Geek and Maxim. He graduated Summa Cum Laude with honors in journalism and mass communication from New York University. Languages: English.

title: Initial Page - Senator Husted
snippet: HUSTED, Jon Allen, a Senator from Ohio; born in Detroit, Mich., August 25, 1967; graduated Montpelier High School, Montpelier, Ohio, 1985; B.A., education, University of Dayton, 1989; M.A., communications, University of Dayton, 1992; vice president for economic development, Dayton area chamber of commerce; member of the Ohio house of representatives, 2001-2009, serving as speaker of the house ...

snippet: 3.
